website_summaries.verdict: A 2-in-1 litter scooping duo with durable scooper and storage that serves 2 purposes for a value price.
pros: This scoop and caddy combo provides a durable scooper and convenient storage caddy that can be clipped to the side of most little boxes
Nonstick surface cuts down on messes
cons: Spaces between the scoop slats are somewhat wide, and allow smaller pieces of debris to fall through

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, but not for heavy loads.
customer_reviews.text: The concept of this is great! I want to give it 5 stars, but I just wish the scooper itself was more sturdy, my cat craps and pisses all the time so when I go to clean her litter box the scooper starts to bend backwards. My litter clumps everything, which is great but it's almost like the scooper can't handle my cats heavy ass pee since it's all clumped together.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hollister

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Non-stick is a total myth. Maybe it's the litter I use, but jeeze I mean c'mon.
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Litter stuck like crazy first time I used it. See pictures. It's not any better than the old one I had. The only reason why I'm going to keep it is because I wanted a scoop with a stand to store it. Unless you're looking for a scoop with a stand too just buy a cheap scoop somewhere else. This one isn't any sturdier or cleaner than cheaper scoops.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Gal

customer_reviews.title: Holder Is Useful Addition
customer_reviews.text: I use this tool with clumping litter, and it works well. The holes are the right size to efficiently clean the litter box. I also really appreciate the holder. It stands up well on its own and is a handy addition to helping to keep the litter area tidy. Overall I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: KlassyKitt

customer_reviews.title: I'd give 5 stars if they explained why "AntiMicrobial" is on the package.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I'm happy with my purchase. It's a good scoop. I just wish Nature's Miracle would elaborate on how this scoop and caddy have antimicrobial properties because I can't find an explanation anywhere. Not even on the website. As far as I'm concerned this is false advertising. I'm impressed by how smoothly it scoops up the wet clumps stuck to the litter box without leaving any streaks on the bottom of the box, and how big, wet, nasty clumps easily glide off of the scoop and into my trash can. However, I've had issues with clumps getting stuck in the slits, which can be a pain to clean off.
customer_reviews.author: aggy p

customer_reviews.title: Pros and cons but generally a good scoop if you have big-clumping litter and a box with square edges.
customer_reviews.text: PROS: The caddy is wonderful. I hooked it on something next to the cat box so it's always within reach. CONS: It's not great for a round cat box or a box with rounded corners. The edges of the scoop are very square and cannot reach clumps that have settled in the rounded corners. The holes in the scoop are quite big and don't work for some kinds of litter. I had to go out and buy litter that makes bigger clumps because the first clumping litter I had did not work at all with this scoop.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Common sense, no-frills
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes products become too full of themselves and end up causing the consumer more headaches than solutions. This is a simple, no-nonsense kitty litter scoop with holder that does the job quickly and neatly. We had the covered scoops for some time and they are bulky and hard to get the dirtied scoop back inside. This solves the problem. BOOM. (Also has a side hook but the kitty litter box we ordered has too thick of a lip for it to fit -- no problem though, it stands upright.)
customer_reviews.author: Grace Fulljames

customer_reviews.title: Simple but Effective!
customer_reviews.text: This scoop is simple in design but works wonderfully. It's sturdy enough to break up and lift heavy litter clumps no problem which is my primary problem with some scoops. It is also nonstick, within reason, which prevents any need to really bang the scoop against the side of the litter box which always inevitably scatters grossness everywhere. I love the caddy as well. Get this scoop!
customer_reviews.author: Emily K.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I've bought 3 or 4 of these. They're perfect! PROS: - The scoop is the right size and sturdiness to really get in there and scoop your litter. If you've ever used an inferior scoop, you know what I'm talking about. This one is NOT flimsy. It's wide enough. Deep enough. The holes are perfect. It's all good. - Having a stand to put the scoop in! - The stand never falls over unless a cat hits it or something, but it isn't interesting enough to double as a toy, thankfully. CONS: - none
customer_reviews.author: DisneyDenizen

customer_reviews.title: This is a great scoop and super handy
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I would write a review for a cat litter scoop, but here I am. This thing is great and fits on the side of most litter boxes. The holder will also hold more than one scoop if needed. In the 3.5 years I have not had an issue with litter sticking to the scoop, but I also don't use clay litter (e.g. tidy cat - clumping or not). Grass seed, wheat, corn, and pine do not stick. If anything, gooey, does get stuck it quickly falls off the scoop. And this scoop is the perfect width and size for sifting pine pelleted litter.
customer_reviews.author: N. X. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for about a week, and so far it works well for me. I bought it to replace the scooper that came with the litter genie. This scooper is bigger than that one, and has a slightly different angle. Because of the slight angle difference, it scrapes the bottom of the litter box better. I haven't had any issue with litter or waste sticking to the scooper, and it seems sturdy enough. I'll update my review once I've had it for longer...but, for now, it does what I need it to do (better than the litter genie scooper).
customer_reviews.author: ButterflyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Found on Top 10 List- It lived up to the hype
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy, no nonsense scoop. I bought it before getting my cat and found it on a top ten list. I've had her for two years and this scoop has been reliable and easy to use the whole time (and easy to wash). I didn't realize what a higher quality scoop this was until we got a second litter box and a new, random scoop (for convenience) from Petsmart. The new (different brand) scoop is floppy and frustrating to use. I didn't know how good we had it until faced with a different kind. Would definitely recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Nadene L.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: As other reviews state, the scoop is not impressive at all, easily clots with urine and litter and is flimsy. I bought this more for the stand which I don't attach to the box (I just wanted the scooper to have a storage spot instead of laying around). I would say if you are wanting this for a great scooper then definitely keep looking but if you want a good scoop holder then this is not too bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the worst scooper I have ever had as far as it's ability to get the litter CLEAN! I don't have an issue with the sturdiness of the scooper or the holder. My biggest issue is that the holes in the scooper itself are TOO WIDE/OPEN/BIG! It leaves behind small chunks of urine and feces. I now have to buy another scooper that will thoroughly clean her litter. The holder will be useful for the new scooper I get. If the width of the holes in the scooper can be fixed, this would have the potential to be a GREAT scooper.
customer_reviews.author: LennyP

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised, and just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Scoop and caddy are both sturdy and of excellent quality. The caddy fits nicely between the halves of my (relatively standard) hooded litter box from Target, regardless of whether I hook it on the side of the box or the rear, and keeps the scoop handy yet out of the way. Perhaps it's silly of me, but my main reason for choosing this particular scoop/caddy was that it came in black, which goes with the rest of my decor. The fact that it is allegedly antimicrobial is a definite plus, however, considering what you're dealing with. I expect these items to last a long time and am very pleased with my purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: CyberneticNixie

customer_reviews.title: The holder is a great feature!
customer_reviews.text: I like that this scoop has a holder for it. We originally clipped it on the end of our cat's litter box, but after she'd use the bathroom it would be on the floor. So we found it easier to just set it on the floor next to her litter box so it doesn't get knocked off every day. The scooper itself works well and is sturdy. I've been using it regularly for the last 8 months and it's held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Brocko

customer_reviews.title: Read my review
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 high sided way too small litter boxes because they came with pooper scoopers and these hang off the side cradle holders for the feces caked pooper scoopers to be stored in, except my box, when opened, had but one scooper and one missing scooper!!! I am owed a scooper and I am not going to go through the inconvenience of returning a litter box to be sent an entire replacement
customer_reviews.author: Pahoo Katawa

customer_reviews.title: I think this scoop is pretty big. It's plastic so it's not as strong ...
customer_reviews.text: I think this scoop is pretty big. It's plastic so it's not as strong as metal but it's bigger and stronger than my last plastic one (standard light blue one). It's strong enough to pick up some very tough stuck-on clumps. I think it's priced too high but the caddy is nice and can hook onto the side of the litter box. I wish the slots were a little narrower. It's low-stick but it's not nonstick. It's much more sanitary to have the scoop in this caddy than the little cardboard box I was using before.
customer_reviews.author: Joan of Arc

customer_reviews.title: It does stick
customer_reviews.text: I like the caddy this comes in, but don't be fooled the crap still sticks on it. False advertising. It stuck after about 3 scoops.
customer_reviews.author: TERRIE

customer_reviews.title: Weak scoop
customer_reviews.text: I bought one set and discovered that the scoop is very weak. It will certainly break easily. But I really like the scoop caddy. It is big enough to hold my large aluminum scoop. I haven't seen any reasonably priced caddies only. Since I have several litter boxes through the house, I bought 2 more sets, just for the caddies. The caddy alone is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Al Abama

customer_reviews.title: Flimsey but it works
customer_reviews.text: I purchased both the Nature Miracle box and scoop. The scoop is somewhat flimsey but it works okay so far. I like that it hooks to the side of the box. The box is similarly light weight and tends to scoot along my tile floor when trying to scoop. Irritating! But the high sides of the box solves the problem of my high-peeing kitty so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Some people claim this is a "flimsy" product but I've had zero issues (also have no idea how many cats they have or more importantly, how often they clean their litter boxes). I have two cats and clean my boxes usually every other day. LOVE the caddy and it fits nicely on the edge of my covered box. I have some heavy "pee'ers" and have had zero issues or even thought the scoop would break. Two thumbs up from me!
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: A good scoop
customer_reviews.text: The size and design of the Nature's Miracle Non-Stick Antimicrobial Scoop & Caddy make cleaning litter boxes more efficient than smaller designs. The scoop is very sturdy and does not accumulate material. I can't speak for the anti-microbial effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Super Duper Pooper Scooper
customer_reviews.text: I am actually surprised that I would care about how well a poop scoop works... but here we are! I just ordered this on a whim because the scoop that came with my litter genie was too small for the impressive poops my cat leaves behind. I think he might be part dinosaur. This thing has slots all the way around the scoop part letting the litter sift out easily, and the wide/deep design allows for scooping through deeper litter without getting your hands dirty. And it handles giant poops like a champ. 10/10 would scoop again.
customer_reviews.author: CDM

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and does the job.
customer_reviews.text: You would not believe how hard it was for me to find a litter scoop in stores! I finally gave up and ordered this. I have had it 30 seconds and already used it. It seems well made and it does what it's supposed to do. Now my cat has a full service potty complete with an attendant (me)! He has the Ecoflex Litter Loo. I am thinking of putting a tip jar on the top of it as a joke...
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Ok for what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Its made for scooping up poop, it does it’s job. Cats poop and pee are always unpleasant and becomes a sticky mess. It’ does the job but it’s not the greatest. It is not non stick and over a little time it’s pretty messy, but easy to clean - as to how willing you are to clean something in your sink that’s covered in poop...
customer_reviews.author: Nicole D.

customer_reviews.title: Did not clean off well
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact it hung on the high sides of my open litter box. But I'm in an apt. and it was not easy to clean off. The wet litter that clumps stuck all over the scoop. Tried using a Clorox wipe to clean it off, but it did not work. I just ordered a stainless steel scoop that the litter will not stick to and ordered the size that fits in the scoop holder.
customer_reviews.author: Karen H.

customer_reviews.title: Did not use as intended
customer_reviews.text: I decided to make a little littler box for my pot-bellied pig when he was tiny (about 5 years ago now), and had hoped to use this to pick up any poop or pee. The plan did not go as intended. The "litter box" turned into his favorite toy at the time, and he destroyed it. However, I am sure this would have worked for those that are able to use it as intended for their other pets.
customer_reviews.author: themysterymachine27x

customer_reviews.title: Nice Non-Stick Finish
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! Hated my old scoop as it immediately became encrusted with litter and wouldn't clean off, short of using a firehose (TMI?). While this one isn't completely non-stick; I'd put it at 99% non-stick which is great since I'm not constantly trying to chisel ooky litter off it. My biggest fear is that the slick finish will will wear off from the constant scooping of litter and become encrusted like my old scoop. Should this happen, I'll be sure to update this review, giving an idea of how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: rainydays

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy! Not nonstick though..
customer_reviews.text: Well, it's not nonstick.. although who would expect any scoop to be, really. The biggest reason I wanted to review is that it feels really, really flimsy. I'm using it to clean my kitten's litter box once a day and have trouble even scooping some of the bigger clumps out. Would not recommend, I assume I'll be buying a new scoop before the month is over Fall 2019 update: it’s still kicking! No breaks and the container does well to keep things clean. Only complaint is that it’s top heavy so falls over often, and litter definitely sticks
customer_reviews.author: Liz S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: we've been using this product for a couple months now and it has been a huge improvement over an open letter box. the cats walk in no problem, they bat the door a few minutes before coming out but they've never been stuck so. I think they're OK with the new style. from a human view point- no odor and no easily visible sign of cats. the box tucks away in a corner and is easily overlooked. the bag 'hook' works well in preventing spilled litter. and the filter seems to do it's job. we paid $24.19 for the box and $2.34 for replacement filter. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: USA traveler

customer_reviews.title: Economical option for Scooping the Poop
customer_reviews.text: I have now bought three of these scoops, one for each cat box in my home. I love that you can conceal the scoop inside and hang it where it is handy to use. This makes my daily chore of cleaning the box easier to do in the morning before I go to work. I can clean both the scoop and the holder easily enough and my cats leave them alone.
customer_reviews.author: nanh2os

customer_reviews.title: I threw mine in the trash along with my cat's poop.
customer_reviews.text: I guess I was expecting something a little better with all of the positive reviews here but I just wasn't impressed. The angle was weird and made it hard to scoop anything. And it just got so gross so quickly. I don't know what they were talking about in their product details: 2 in 1 order control and non-stick service? I don't think so. Plus, my cat would constantly knock it out of the the little cubby and play with it. So it never stayed clean and on the side of the box. Which is probably not typical but if you have a playful cat like mine, then you should move on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought for just the caddy
customer_reviews.text: The litter scoop is thin and I doubt it would hold up to clumping litter. However, I chose this solely for the caddy. Perfectly hooks onto the side of a rolling Origami shelving unit where I keep the cat supplies. The caddy is large enough to hold the metal Jumbo DuraScoop. Priced right for the size and function I needed.
customer_reviews.author: superdogmom

customer_reviews.title: Best Scooper I've Owned
customer_reviews.text: I've had cats for years and this is the best design, size, etc, that I have owned yet. It stays in it's stand, it does not break holes in the box liner, and it stays relatively clean and it's easy to clean with a wipe. It's a cat litter scoop and it does just that easily. Glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: craftgal

customer_reviews.title: Yesssss
customer_reviews.text: Such a little thing, but this has made me so much happier! I was keeping our kitty poop scoop in a plastic bag, but it was an eye sore and dust was collecting around the area. This little bin makes me feel like it’s more sanitary storage as it’s all contained, it looks better, and it sits well on its own. Thank you for making this product! Simple but effective.
customer_reviews.author: J. S. Stocker

customer_reviews.title: Great caddy. Keep the caddy, and replace the scoop with a metal one.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the caddy. I hook this to a trash can with a lid, and it fits perfectly, doesn't interfere with the lid locking to the trash can. I tried out the scoop and it's not that great, which I expected because it's plastic, but I only wanted the caddy. I use the metal Durascoop and iPrimiro litter scoops and they are far superior. They're much larger, but they do fit the caddy.
customer_reviews.author: HY

customer_reviews.title: Not the cat's meow
customer_reviews.text: This is not "non-stick" if you have clumping cat litter. It's also very flimsy and bends if you have to apply any pressure where the clumped litter is stuck to the side or bottom of the litter pan. I kept the container (it is very convenient to hang off the side of the box) but replaced the scoop with a metal one.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Svinis

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of the scoop has a curve in it so it doesn't scrape the bottom of your litter box leaving feces in the litter no matter how hard you try to get it out
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Yenter

customer_reviews.title: Not non-stick, but pretty sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly non stick, but I wasn't banking on it being non stick . I just wanted a sturdier cat litter scoop than the one I had from my local dollar store. This one is thicker and doesn't bend. It works for me! The caddy is another main reason I bought it. Looks nice
customer_reviews.author: Ryan D.

customer_reviews.title: fair poo scooper
customer_reviews.text: I don't see what the miracle is. It scoops catpoo and litter but it still gets sticky and has to be cleaned. I do like that it comes with a little holder, but the plastic is so lightweight that it all falls over. Also doesn't scoop a lot of litter at one time without bending just a little. I went back to my metal scooper and would suggest spending a little more for something like metal.
customer_reviews.author: Health nuttybuddy

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed! I clean the scooper more often than the litter box!
customer_reviews.text: No one likes to clean their cats litter boxes. I was looking forward to this one having read all the positive reviews, however, I am very disappointed with this product. After using it for the last 2 weeks, I find that every single day I must clean the residual poop and cat litter that has stuck to the scooper. I have never had to clean my scooper as much as this product. Yes, it is sturdy, however as others have mentioned the slots are so big that small pieces keep falling back into the cat box. I am now looking to buy another scooper.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie A

customer_reviews.title: Nice Large Caddy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the caddy only. I'm using it with my Pyrus metal cat litter scoop, and it works well. I have a Lucky Champ litter pan, and the caddy will not hang over the sides of that pan as they are too wide. Fortunately it will hang over the back of the box, and that's how I'm using it. It's a nice large caddy. I don't like plastic litter scoops so can't comment on that.
customer_reviews.author: C. Richards

customer_reviews.title: Really great if you've got a litter box it attaches too.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great idea and very functional. The caddy will also work with other scoops if the original break or gets too gross. My only issue is the way the caddy attaches. It has a simple hanger to hook to the side of the little box, but if you box has a rounded side or lip, the caddy doesn't hook very well. I liked the product so I decided to get a box that it works with, but if you already have a litter box you really like, this might not work well with it.
customer_reviews.author: Christy P.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and sanitary storage
customer_reviews.text: This product was a life changer for me. I don't hang it on the litterbox since it's covered, instead I hang it on the side of my trashcan. The scoop isn't flimsy and the litter hasn't stuck to it too much either. It's very convenient and more sanitary since it has it own container. I haven't washed it yet, though I've had it for about 6 months and I hasn't had the need to. Fyi I have one cat.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Slots are just a bit too widely spread.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a litter scooper with a holder as the hubs built a wooden litter box container to hide it all in. Only gripe is that the slots are a bit wide so smaller pieces of poop fall they. We use the world’s best litter clumping.... so that’s kind of annoying.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sah

customer_reviews.title: Thankful for this
customer_reviews.text: I love this, who wants to see their scooper just sitting freely somewhere? I don’t know what other people do to store theirs, but this is a no brainer for me. I do clean it, but I just ordered another one after about 6 months since it’s so inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for Your Buck!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this scoop! The low price for all that you get was so worth it! The scoop caddy has a clip allowing it to attach onto the side of the litter box making it always close by! I’ve lost so many scoops because they get placed outside the house away from the box and end up lost, but this really helped eliminate that issue! It’s sturdy and out of the way! I’m not sure why others are having a bad experience with this scoop, it’s truly nonstick and when the slight bit of litter does get stuck, it washes right off with no issues looking new again in no time!
customer_reviews.author: Jackson Suek

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Now I can keep my scooper attached to kitty litter box and off the floor. Scoops well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bit on the small side
customer_reviews.text: I selected this scoop because of the caddy. I hate trying to find somewhere to put the scoop between uses. The scoop works find and the caddy is very useful. However, I have 3 cats and 3 litter boxes. With that much to do, I find that the scoop is a bit on the small side. It would probably be perfect for a 1 cat household though.
customer_reviews.author: Angela K

customer_reviews.title: Connoisseur (sadly) of poopie scoopies
customer_reviews.text: I'm very picky about my "pooper scoopers," and this is the best. First of all, it has a caddy, which is genius. And there's something about the design that sets it apart from others. It has little areas in the corners that are solid, so you can scoop out the smaller bits of "stuff" that would fall through the cracks in the main part of the scoop. If you're like me, and you like your kitty's box to be as clean as possible, that's important. I should mention that I use the clumping cat litter.
customer_reviews.author: L. Giles

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: The scooper is of great quality, and is able to remove the concrete that my cat produces without bending. It is not non-stick as claimed, but it is no more difficult to clean than any other. With the included holder, I do not worry about anything sticking to it, so it does the job well--better than most, and is inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Ray B.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: The first scoop it broke. My cats urinate often and cause large clumps but my original scooper is what I'm STILL USING. Ido not reccomend easily dirtied to the point that you have to put on glove to remove waist that stuck like glue. Also broke on first use 😐
customer_reviews.author: Just looking

customer_reviews.title: Not flexible
customer_reviews.text: Because it is so sturdy and strong there is no flexibility to go under soil. This results in me scraping the litter to get it into a position to be scooped. I love the caddy though and it keeps things discreet, but I dislike the scooper.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Is indeed a scoop.
customer_reviews.text: There is only so much one can say about a litter scoop. I'm pretty skilled with one, and I feel like this thing's effectiveness is really a function of your prowess with a scoop. I'll say this. It hasn't broken or bent. That really was its only job. I need some better litter, but that has nothing to do with this scoop.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Months later, still great
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a replacement for another scoop we bought at Petsmart (which was cheap and broke). This scoop is sturdy and does everything you need it to. Not much to say, other than we are happy with our purchase; we would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: WormCakes

customer_reviews.title: Fits with Natures Miracle Hooded Litter Box
customer_reviews.text: The nature's miracle scoop and caddy FITS the Natures miracle hooded litter box with the lid on! The hook is just big enough for it to work. I was very pleased with this. Over all, the scoop is large and works beautifully too.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa Bonham

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job
customer_reviews.text: We've gone through our fair share of litter scoops over the years. By far this is the best. As our cat has aged, let's just say her bowel movements have been...less than great. With this scoop, we've had no problem with cleaning out the litter box. The little caddy to store it is a bonus too!
customer_reviews.author: M Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Nice Scoop...less poop!
customer_reviews.text: Great Scoop! We scoop as soon as kitty goes, so we scoop a lot! He uses a natural corn litter, which clumps wonderfully, but offers no odor control. We find ourselves cleaning the scoop and caddy less often than our previous scoops, because less litter adheres to it and I feel it retains less odor. We have been using this Nature's Miracle Non-Stick Antimicrobial Scoop exclusively for months and have been very happy with its performance.
customer_reviews.author: Time2Buy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This cat litter scooper is a must! Although it didn’t fit on the side of my litter box it was perfect compliment to my disposal receptical where it hangs perfectly and the trash can is still able to close completely
customer_reviews.author: Gracie B

customer_reviews.title: not like a metal scooper
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because my metal scoop did not have a convenient storage container. This plastic scoop broke the clumps of pee up, my metal scoop doesn't do that. I threw the plastic scoop away and used the caddy to store my metal scoop.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wooten

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This scoops everything up with no issues. Also love that it connects to the side of the litter box.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: I like that this scoop has a holster and that it ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that this scoop has a holster and that it can be attached to the side of a litter box. The grates on these scoops is a bit too big, though, I wish the openings were narrower, as there are little bits that fall through the cracks that I can't pick up. Next time I'll try to find a scooper with narrower slats, but this does the job alright.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this Nature's Miracle scoop and caddy!
customer_reviews.text: This scoop is truly nonstick. Gone are the days I had to soak the scoop in hot soapy water then scrape off the litter residue. One very fresh clump stuck just a little, but a quick swipe with moistened tissue took it off immediately. The caddy hangs very nicely on the side of the litter box so it's always right at hand. Like most scoops the very small bits slip through, but I just pick them up with the corner of the scoop and drop them into the bag. Cleanup is fast and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: Semi-Non-Stick, Mostly Good
customer_reviews.text: No-Stick is an exaggeration, but Less-Stick describes the situation I experienced nicely. Sticks around the leading edge and is a bit hard to clean there. Other than that, it does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Not non-stick
customer_reviews.text: This is actually my first cat with a litter pan. This scoop is very sturdy but is not non-stick. Not sure if this "non-stick" was just a ploy to get the product or not but what drove me purchasing was the price. The price is great.
customer_reviews.author: tge

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep cat area tidy!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this comes with a place to set it. Makes it so much easier to keep the cat area looking nice when I don’t have to store the scooper in a plastic bag. It works well and seems like it’ll last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Lisak

customer_reviews.title: Best scooper holder!
customer_reviews.text: After trying several commercial options/products to hold our heavy/larger, metal scooper we tried these. They fit great on our covered litter box, are just sturdy enough to hold a full-sized scooper (ours is not plastic like this one; we just tossed these into give-away bin)... and does the job perfectly! At this price, it was such a bargin we got one for each of our three litter boxes. No more having the scoop out or hanging on a wall. Great solution!
customer_reviews.author: Koyangi

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, but the first time that I ordered this, it came without the caddy, so I asked for a replacement. Which they did give me and a full refund and it only took two days for me to receive it.
customer_reviews.author: Anime Addict 😝🖤

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: It says non stick and it means it unlike other scoopers I have had. It scoops well while letting the clean litter filter back into the box with ease and I like that it comes with a holder to put it in
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Not so non-stick, otherwise a good scooper!
customer_reviews.text: This litter scoop claims to be non-stick, but it most definitely isn't. I use Precious Cat cat attract clumping litter and there is just a clump of clay stuff on the scoop that I clean off weekly. I like this scoop though simply because the grates are a good size and I love that I can hide the scooper in an aesthetically pleasing way instead of keeping the scooper in a grocery bag like before ;-) Overall I would recommend, it just didn't live up to the non-stick claim for me.
customer_reviews.author: Peaceful Pines

customer_reviews.title: Big
customer_reviews.text: Its easier to clean the litter box as this scoops up bigger portions.
customer_reviews.author: Mish

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: It felt flimsier than it actually was. It handles larger clumps without breaking or bending. I love having a holder to store it in. It fits perfectly behind the box. Will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good but not non-stick
customer_reviews.text: I like that it doesn't have those stupid spikes on it or sharp edges to snag and tear litter liners. That's a definite plus. It's an all around good scooper and the caddy is nice to have. Nice and sturdy and doesn't feel like it will snap when scooping weighty hunks of litter. My only gripe is that it's not non-stick at all... really not. Wet litter sticks like cement. I have to scrub it off with something abrasive. I use a really excellent clumping litter from Precious Cat, so maybe that's the issue?
customer_reviews.author: Kaci

customer_reviews.title: It stays in place and the cat doesn't bother it!
customer_reviews.text: This is great we clip it on the side of the litter box, so it's right there when u need it! This clean it I get use boiling hot wat er por into toilet left over stuff then it just scrapes off. Great idea the clip part.my daughter bought this!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissie

customer_reviews.title: For the price, not too bad.
customer_reviews.text: Not terrible and does it's job. For such a low price I really can't complain. Worst thing is the mold lines on the bottle of the handle are a little sharp and uncomfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: pressm4n

customer_reviews.title: Does stick a little bit but cleans off easily
customer_reviews.text: This litter scoop does stick a little but it’s very easy to clean it off. I normally wash the scoop once a week. Just soak the scoop in the caddy for 10min and the flush off the residue, there you go a fresh litter scoop again!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Chiang

customer_reviews.title: It is not non stick
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it is definitely not non-stick. Each time I have used it the litter sticks to it. So I would not recommend this product because of that problem. Otherwise it works like a typical litter scoop.
customer_reviews.author: shoe lover

customer_reviews.title: Purchased 3
customer_reviews.text: these are great. I have one for each litterbox. I love the cup it comes with to keep the scoop from touching anything and i also love the little hook on the back of the cup so this can hang.
customer_reviews.author: Goobtube

customer_reviews.title: Nonstick Poop Scoop
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t believe it was non-stick, my girls pee a lot and litter clumps are very wet. It did stick to the scoop, but it dries and the next day I pulled a clean scoop out of the caddy. The clip-on caddy is a marvelous idea, so convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Maneata

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Convenient and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love that it attaches to litter box. I use flushable litter and the litter box is right next to the toilet, so this couldn’t be better. I just scoop, empty into toilet, and put it right back in the holder.
customer_reviews.author: Winksterswife

customer_reviews.title: NOT non-stick
customer_reviews.text: First time I used this it got all caked up with damp litter...cleaned it off and same thing next use. I use Slide litter, scoop the box at least 2X a day. Not impressed with this scoop. The caddy is ok, hooks on the side of the box, which is convenient. Don't think this should be touted as non-stick, because it's no better than any other plastic litter scoop.
customer_reviews.author: NC Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed :(
customer_reviews.text: Oh well.... I purchased this scoop & caddy to have a second one. We have always had a second litter box to set up right away while we sanitize the dirty one. So I wanted another scoop & caddy to have clean and ready to go also. But when I opened the box all that they sent was the caddy, NO SCOOP! Return! So much for convenience... They are cheaper at Wally world anyway.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: I used to just pick up litter with an inside-out ...
customer_reviews.text: I used to just pick up litter with an inside-out doggie bag until someone judged me for it. Dog people are totally ok with picking up poops with a baggie. Cat people, nope, they judge you. Five stars for saving me from the judgement of my peers.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't feel like it'll last long
customer_reviews.text: Bought so we had a scooper for traveling, but it doesn't feel like this will last very long. It's short too, so when you're scooping, you have to be careful not to scoop litter onto your hand
customer_reviews.author: Brenna

customer_reviews.title: You don’t know how much you will appreciate the caddy
customer_reviews.text: Big scoop for big clumps, it’s perfect adequate, but I really appreciate the caddy that hangs on the litter bin. It is nice to have a place for the scoop to live.
customer_reviews.author: E Ru

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Litter Scoop and Caddy. Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this litter scoop and caddy. I like that the caddy hangs on the side of the litter box (need at least 6-7 inch side.) It's easy to clean and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Spring

customer_reviews.title: Holds the scooper
customer_reviews.text: I wish the hook part was a little longer, my cat box is shorter for older cats. Did not use scooper, bought stainless steel shoppers, will never use plastic again.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Lynn

customer_reviews.title: This thing just makes perfect sense.
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand why all scoopers don't come with this little tray to sit in. We bought this with the matching litter box, and I really love how clean it keeps things. Nothing more disgusting than a poppy scooper sitting on the floor. Its durable enough. People complain about the handle not being strong enough, but it sounds like they are trying to dig up bricks?! Perhaps they should scoop their cat box out daily or change litters. We have no issue with scooping your average muck out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Nikolaev

customer_reviews.title: Good for cleaning chicken run sand
customer_reviews.text: I use this to clean the sand in my chicken run. I have has in the run that acts like kitty litter and I can keep it cleaner for my girls! Works great for that!
customer_reviews.author: Elly

customer_reviews.title: Litter scoop and holder
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as described. Hangs on the side of the litter box, which was what I needed. I was always looking for a place to put it until next time. Problem solved. The scoop is plastic and I use clumping litter (for three cats). I have broken a few because with that kind of litter you sometimes have to use a little force to scrape the clumps from the bottom of the litter pan. With this one I have tried to use a little more care and not break it, but if I do I still have the cup and I'll just replace the scoop. As for the non-stick antimicrobial part, can't help with that..
customer_reviews.author: Kay L Sofios

customer_reviews.title: Excellence
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, made with quality, handy storage bin, too. I put a plastic grocery bag over the storage bin so that I can just change it periodically. Very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: MartyJane

customer_reviews.title: Best pet scooper on the market
customer_reviews.text: Great Cat poop scooper I could find. Nice wide scooper. Very sturdy handle and wide slots so litter goes right through, but not any of the litter that has clumped, or other "matter." Sturdy handle is very important because other models I tried, the handle snapped right off. Not this one! Bonus that it comes with it's won storage bin. You can slide in container on to the side of your littler box or just have it stand alone. Not fancy, but gets the job done and I searched high and low for something this quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jerricat

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for several months and it is, overall, a good product. Antimicrobial? I don’t own a microscope so who knows for sure. Non-stick? No... By the third cleaning of the litter box this scoop had the usual “stuff” stuck to it that any other scoop normally collects. Over time that has not changed. All that said... it is good, gets the job done, and the case that it sits in is quite handy to keep it in a more handy location.
customer_reviews.author: Bello

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: It's a scoop. No big deal. But I like the holder. When I scoop up, I put the scoop with the poo inside the holder, holding it sideways to keep from dropping litter or poo as I carry it to the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Ama-Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Best one I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.text: I like this scoop. It gets everything out easily while still sifting. The best part is the holder. I bought a second one because this was the best one I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: Super lightweight and strong. Makes it easier to clean the cat box
customer_reviews.text: I have rheumatoid arthritis and I need something lite to use. This was perfect and it’s now much easier to clean the cat box and I have a nice holder for the scoop. Excellent price for such a helpful product
customer_reviews.author: M. East

customer_reviews.title: Only received scoop, no caddy
customer_reviews.text: Only received scoop, no caddy. Have no use for it. Attempted to return it and while they refunded my money, they said I didn’t need to return it. So, now I have a scoop with no caddy just sitting in my closest. It’s weird the things they want you to return as opposed to just refunding your money.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Karbon

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: What’s not to love. It holds the scoop to the litter avoid mess. The scoop works great and is down to scoop up the heaviest of messes. I would completely recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Kimkay

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This is good! It works well. Strong. No odor problems.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Franklin

product_meta.title: Nature's Miracle Non-Stick Antimicrobial Scoop & Caddy (P-82036)
product_meta.description: Color:Original VersionNature's miracle scoop and caddy conveniently attaches to the litter box. The slotted scoop is perfectly sided to make cleaning the litter box a breeze.
feature_bullets: Our 2-in-1 odor control and antimicrobial product protection inhibit odors caused by bacteria
Non-stick surface makes for easy cleaning

specifications.Included Components: Nature's Miracle Non-Stick Antimicrobial Scoop & Caddy
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,887 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
